title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution with real-time inventory management
longDescription: Built a comprehensive e-commerce platform featuring user authentication, product management, shopping cart functionality, and secure payment processing. Implemented real-time inventory tracking and order management system.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management tool with real-time updates
longDescription: Developed a collaborative task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, real-time synchronization using WebSockets, team collaboration features, and advanced filtering options.

title: Weather Dashboard
description: Real-time weather tracking with interactive maps and forecasts
longDescription: Created a weather dashboard that displays current conditions, 7-day forecasts, and interactive weather maps. Integrated multiple weather APIs for accurate data and implemented location-based services.

title: Portfolio CMS
description: Content management system for creative professionals
longDescription: Built a headless CMS specifically designed for portfolio websites. Features include drag-and-drop page builder, media management, SEO optimization tools, and customizable templates.
